channel.title: Can someone help me please with my form
channel.description: This is the error im getting: [code][Runtime Error] : Could not call proc in line 183[/code] And this si line 183: [code]procedure SetupAll; begin RockType := ComboBox1.Text; end;[/code] What does that error mean and how cna i fix it?

item.title: Can someone help me please with my form
item.dc:creator: @bullzeye95 bullzeye
item.description:
@bullzeye95 wrote:

Yea sure

item.title: Can someone help me please with my form

item.title: Can someone help me please with my form
item.dc:creator: @bullzeye95 bullzeye
item.description:
@bullzeye95 wrote:

I see the problem. You’re trying to setup the variables before you show the form. Make your main loop this: [scar]begin
SafeInitForm;
SafeShowFormModal;
SetUpAll;
end.[/scar]

Read full topic
item.source: Can someone help me please with my form

item.title: Can someone help me please with my form
item.dc:creator: @arr0w Arr0w
item.description:
@arr0w wrote:

okay sorry here the script ( well form )

[code]
program New;
var
frmDesign : TForm;
Label1 : TLabel;
Label2 : TLabel;
Label3 : TLabel;
Label4 : TLabel;
Label5 : TLabel;
Label6 : TLabel;
Label7 : TLabel;
ComboBox1 : TComboBox;
ComboBox2 : TComboBox;
ComboBox3 : TComboBox;
Edit1 : TEdit;
Button1 : TButton;

var
RockType, RunDir, Chats, Loads : String;

Procedure ButtonClick(sender : tobject);
begin
frmDesign.ModalResult := Mrok;
frmDesign.Caption:= frmDesign.Caption + ‘.’;
end;

procedure InitForm;
begin
frmDesign := CreateForm;
frmDesign.Left := 250;
frmDesign.Top := 114;
frmDesign.Width := 617;
frmDesign.Height := 360;
frmDesign.Caption := ‘PowerMiner V3 By Arr0w’;
frmDesign.Color := clBtnFace;
frmDesign.Font.Color := clMaroon;
frmDesign.Font.Height := -13;
frmDesign.Font.Name := ‘Roman’;
frmDesign.Font.Style := [];
frmDesign.Visible := False;
frmDesign.PixelsPerInch := 96;
Label1 := TLabel.Create(frmDesign);
Label1.Parent := frmDesign;
Label1.Left := 172;
Label1.Top := 22;
Label1.Width := 164;
Label1.Height := 18;
Label1.Caption := ‘PowerMiner V3 By Arr0w’;
Label1.Font.Color := clMaroon;
Label1.Font.Height := -16;
Label1.Font.Name := ‘Roman’;
Label1.Font.Style := [fsBold, fsUnderline];
Label1.ParentFont := False;
Label2 := TLabel.Create(frmDesign);
Label2.Parent := frmDesign;
Label2.Left := 222;
Label2.Top := 89;
Label2.Width := 181;
Label2.Height := 15;
Label2.Caption := ‘What Rock Do You Want To Mine?’;
Label2.Font.Color := clMaroon;
Label2.Font.Height := -13;
Label2.Font.Name := ‘Roman’;
Label2.Font.Style := [];
Label2.ParentFont := False;
Label3 := TLabel.Create(frmDesign);
Label3.Parent := frmDesign;
Label3.Left := 222;
Label3.Top := 122;
Label3.Width := 230;
Label3.Height := 15;
Label3.Caption := ‘What Direction To Run if A Fight Is Found.’;
Label4 := TLabel.Create(frmDesign);
Label4.Parent := frmDesign;
Label4.Left := 224;
Label4.Top := 155;
Label4.Width := 176;
Label4.Height := 15;
Label4.Caption := ‘Do You Want To Turn Off Chats?’;
Label5 := TLabel.Create(frmDesign);
Label5.Parent := frmDesign;
Label5.Left := 198;
Label5.Top := 191;
Label5.Width := 236;
Label5.Height := 15;
Label5.Caption := ‘Type Here How Many Loads You Want To Do’;
Label6 := TLabel.Create(frmDesign);
Label6.Parent := frmDesign;
Label6.Left := 7;
Label6.Top := 273;
Label6.Width := 599;
Label6.Height := 15;
Label6.Caption :=
‘This powerminer was made by Arr0w, You are using V3.For V1 and V’ +
‘2 look on moparisthebest or villu-reborn.’;
Label7 := TLabel.Create(frmDesign);
Label7.Parent := frmDesign;
Label7.Left := 6;
Label7.Top := 297;
Label7.Width := 536;
Label7.Height := 15;
Label7.Caption :=
'Post bugs and issues and bugs at moparisthebest, or email me at ’ +
‘scott-_-bradford@hotmail.com’;
ComboBox1 := TComboBox.Create(frmDesign);
ComboBox1.Parent := frmDesign;
ComboBox1.Left := 68;
ComboBox1.Top := 85;
ComboBox1.Width := 145;
ComboBox1.Height := 23;
ComboBox1.ItemHeight := 15;
ComboBox1.TabOrder := 8;
ComboBox1.Text := ‘Rock Type?’;
ComboBox1.Items.Add(‘Tin’);
ComboBox1.Items.Add(‘Copper’);
ComboBox1.Items.Add(‘Iron’);
ComboBox1.Items.Add(‘Gold’);
ComboBox2 := TComboBox.Create(frmDesign);
ComboBox2.Parent := frmDesign;
ComboBox2.Left := 67;
ComboBox2.Top := 117;
ComboBox2.Width := 145;
ComboBox2.Height := 23;
ComboBox2.ItemHeight := 15;
ComboBox2.TabOrder := 9;
ComboBox2.Text := ‘Run Direction?’;
ComboBox2.Items.Add(‘N’);
ComboBox2.Items.Add(‘E’);
ComboBox2.Items.Add(‘S’);
ComboBox2.Items.Add(‘W’);
ComboBox3 := TComboBox.Create(frmDesign);
ComboBox3.Parent := frmDesign;
ComboBox3.Left := 67;
ComboBox3.Top := 150;
ComboBox3.Width := 145;
ComboBox3.Height := 23;
ComboBox3.ItemHeight := 15;
ComboBox3.TabOrder := 10;
ComboBox3.Text := ‘Chats Off?’;
ComboBox3.Items.Add(‘True’);
ComboBox3.Items.Add(‘False’);
Edit1 := TEdit.Create(frmDesign);
Edit1.Parent := frmDesign;
Edit1.Left := 67;
Edit1.Top := 187;
Edit1.Width := 121;
Edit1.Height := 23;
Edit1.TabOrder := 11;
Button1 := TButton.Create(frmDesign);
Button1.Parent := frmDesign;
Button1.OnClick := @ButtonClick;
Button1.Left := 240;
Button1.Top := 234;
Button1.Width := 75;
Button1.Height := 25;
Button1.Caption := ‘Start!’;
Button1.TabOrder := 12;
end;

procedure SafeInitForm;
var
v: TVariantArray;
begin
setarraylength(V, 0);
ThreadSafeCall(‘InitForm’, v);
end;

procedure ShowFormModal;
begin
frmDesign.ShowModal;
end;

procedure SafeShowFormModal;
var
v: TVariantArray;
begin
setarraylength(V, 0);
ThreadSafeCall(‘ShowFormModal’, v);
end;

procedure SetupAll;
begin
RockType := ComboBox1.Text;
end;

begin
SetUpAll;
SafeInitForm;
SafeShowFormModal;
end.[/code]
